shows.title: Me Before You
shows.plot_overview: A small town girl is caught between dead-end jobs. A high-profile, successful man becomes wheelchair bound following an accident. The man decides his life is not worth living until the girl is hired for six months to be his new caretaker. Worlds apart and trapped together by circumstance, the two get off to a rocky start. But the girl becomes determined to prove to the man that life is worth living and as they embark on a series of adventures together, each finds their world changing in ways nei

shows.title: BeLIEf
shows.plot_overview: When a revengeful heretic threatens to use a telekinetic teenager to destroy all religion, a disillusioned renegade realises he must stop them enacting an apocalyptic unholy war.

shows.title: Single Mother Father
shows.plot_overview: a successful party planner known for her lightheartedness and love for her work. However, her life turns upside down after meeting a young author who dreams of fame, and a series of comedic situations and ironies begin between them, ending in a love story full of ups and downs.

shows.title: Girl Taken
shows.plot_overview: Follow the story of twin sisters Lily and Abby, whose lives are shattered when Lily is abducted from their quiet rural English town by beloved local teacher Rick Hansen. After years of abuse in captivity, Lily escapes - only to discover that freedom brings its own challenges.

shows.title: Kusunoki's Garden of Gods
shows.plot_overview: Deep in the countryside, Minato Kusunoki is left in charge of a terrifying house overflowing with evil spirits or at least it was, until his extraordinary ability cleared them all out! Instead, a procession of unique and peculiar gods is drawn to the comfort of the purified Kusunoki residence, and Minato spends his days relaxing in the company of his spiritual neighbors. What else lies in store for Minato as he lives peacefully surrounded by gods?

shows.title: Criminal Conundrums
shows.plot_overview: A fierce snowstorm traps guests inside a hotel but when a guest is found dead, it becomes clear: the real threat is inside.
